TopicTitle: Drag and click selection of debris

Articles.Content:
I'm sure I'm not the only player to suffer catastrophic failures and thereby create a minefield of debris around the KSC during testing... What I find frustrating is that I have to select and recover each piece of debris (even more so when you accidentally hit fly instead of recover)

Would it not be possible to add a drag and select function for the Space Centre scene so that it's much easier to clean up the debris fields, y'know for when you crashed a 300part ship and it broke up into 300 parts...

I threw this into the search bar, but it didn't return anything... So apologies if this has been covered before.
Yeah if F3 report says "crashed" we should get debris grouped under single craft name.
